name: Dhara-Rakshak ‚Äî Landslide Risk Assessment
description: Advanced AI-powered landslide risk assessment and decision support tool. Integrates 6 live APIs (weather, seismic, elevation, soil, geocoding, historical rainfall) with multi-method geotechnical analysis (Infinite Slope, Bishop, Janbu, Monte Carlo) aligned to Indian Standards (IS 14496, NIDM 2019). v3.0.
